about_the_game: Kiss/OFF: AUDITION is a prologue to Kiss/OFF, a comedy visual novel set for release in 2022. You play as Vic Powers, college track star and all-around charmer. Vic has a big day ahead of him — he plans to ask out *that special person* he’s had a crush on for the past few weeks. However, when he receives a threatening phone call from the mysterious ‘X,’ he’s given a challenge: If he CAN’T successfully ask out his crush, Vic will never see them again. With each failure (or success), reality resets and changes in unpredictable ways. What follows is an introduction to Steffi, Arturo, and Risq, the three main alien love interests of ‘Kiss/OFF,’ as well as the complete breakdown of reality as Vic knows it.
